metadata.description: The casts of Zenescope's flagship series – Grimm Fairy Tales, Robyn Hood, and Hellchild – unite for an event to end all comic book events... the apocalypse. One year ago, Robyn Hood and Marian Quin united to imprison the Four Horsemen underneath New York City, preventing the apocalypse. Now, faced with the return of these unstoppable, immortal demons, Robyn had a choice: sacrifice the world... or her soul.
metadata.name: Grimm Fairy Tales: Apocalypse
